Class AppAction

java.lang.Object
com.gr15.pacman.controller.AppAction
public final class AppAction extends Object
A utility class that defines common application-level actions used across controllers. These actions are typically passed to UI event handlers (e.g., buttons, key presses).

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final BiConsumer<Integer, GameController>
    GAME_OVER
    Action to switch to game over view.
    static final Runnable
    MAIN_MENU
    Action to switch to the main menu view.
    static final Consumer<InputStream>
    NEW_GAME
    Action to start a new game using configuration from an InputStream.
    static final Consumer<GameController>
    PAUSE
    Action to switch to pause view.
    static final Consumer<GameController>
    PLAY_AGAIN
    Action to reset the current game and start it again from the beginning.
    static final Runnable
    QUIT
    Action to immediately quit the application.
    static final Consumer<GameController>
    RESUME
    Action to resume a paused game by showing the game view and starting the game loop.
    static final BiConsumer<Integer, GameController>
    YOU_WON
    Action to switch to winningview.

      public static final Consumer<GameController> PAUSE
      Action to switch to pause view.

    • RESUME

      public static final Consumer<GameController> RESUME
      Action to resume a paused game by showing the game view and starting the game loop.

    • NEW_GAME

      public static final Consumer<InputStream> NEW_GAME
      Action to start a new game using configuration from an InputStream. It sets up the game state, view, and controller, and starts the game loop.

    • PLAY_AGAIN

      public static final Consumer<GameController> PLAY_AGAIN
      Action to reset the current game and start it again from the beginning.
